member.name: PropertyChainSource
member.summary: Represents the source object (a Style) of a target type.

member.name: PropertyChainSource.TargetType
member.summary: The target type of the style, defined in markup.

member.name: PropertyChainSource.Name
member.summary: The name of the style, if it has an x:Name defined in markup.

member.name: PropertyChainSource.Source
member.summary: Where the style is defined in the application .

member.name: PropertyChainSource.srcInfo
member.summary: Source information about where the style is defined.
